DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Time Period
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Capacity (blue), Contracted Time (red) & Weeks with not Enough Capacity","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":2,"WidgetRows":11,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2018/06/1","endDate":"2019/06/30","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  t.[Date] - datepart(dw, t.[Date]) + 1 as Week,
        sum(t.WorkingTime - t.Holidays - t.Leaves) as Capacity,
        sum(t.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
        iif(sum(t.WorkingTime - t.Holidays - t.Leaves - t.ContractedTime) < 0, sum(t.WorkingTime - t.Holidays - t.Leaves), null) as NotEnoughCapacity
from    (
                select	
					--du.UserTypologyGroupId as TypologyGroupOid,
					--du.Oid as UserOid,
					du.[Date] as [Date],
					sum(du.RequiredHours) as WorkingTime,
					sum(du.HolidayTime) as Holidays,
					sum(du.LeaveTime) as Leaves,
					0 as ContractedTime
				from
					Analytics.DatamartUser du
				where
					datepart(dw, du.[Date]) not in (1,7)
					and Year(du.[Date]) = @year
				group by
					--du.UserTypologyGroupId, du.Oid, 
                    du.[Date]
                union all
                select  
					--t.TypolodyGroupOid,
                    --t.UserOid,
					t.[Date],
					0 as WorkingTime,
					0 as Holidays,
					0 as Leaves,
					sum(t.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime
                from    (
                            select 
								--de.UserTypologyGroupId as TypolodyGroupOid,
								--de.UserId as UserOid,
								de.[Date] as [Date],
								sum(de.[Hours] / (datediff(dd, de.[Date], de.Expiration) + 1)) as ContractedTime
							from 
								Analytics.DatamartEstimate de 
								left outer join EstimateItemDetail eid on eid.Oid = de.ItemId
							where
								eid.[Type] = 2 and
								Year(de.[Date]) = @year
							group by 
								--de.UserTypologyGroupId,
								--de.UserId,
								de.[Date]
                        ) t
                group by 
					--t.TypolodyGroupOid, 
					--t.UserOid, 
					t.[Date]
        ) t
where   
	Year(t.[Date]) = @year
group by 
	t.[Date] - datepart(dw, t.[Date]) + 1","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["year"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Typology Groups
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Staff, Proposals & Timesheet","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":13,"WidgetRows":17,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"? Delayed To Do","metricFieldValue":"DelayedToDoJobsGrandTotal"},{"visible":true,"metricName":"?  Delayed Work in Progress","metricFieldValue":"DelayedWorkInProgressJobsGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"with HeadCount as (
select 
		v.UserTypologyGroupId,
		v.WorkDays,
		sum(v.TypologyWorkDays) as TypologyWorkDays,
		v.Workers as TypologyWorkers,
		(sum(v.TypologyWorkDays) * 1.0) / (v.WorkDays * 1.0) as HeadCount
from (
	select 
			v.UserTypologyGroupId,
			v.WorkDays,
			count(v.UserId) as TypologyWorkDays,
			count(v.UserId) OVER (partition by v.UserTypologyGroupId) as Workers
	from (
		select	
				(DATEDIFF(dd, @FromDate, @ToDate) + 1)
				-(DATEDIFF(wk, @FromDate, @ToDate) * 2)
				-(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, @FromDate) = 'Sunday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
				-(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, @ToDate) = 'Saturday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
				as WorkDays,
				v.UserId,
				v.UserTypologyGroupId,
				v.[Date]
		from	
				Analytics.DatamartTimesheet v
				left outer join dbo.[User] u on u.Oid = v.UserId
		where	
				v.[Date] between IIf(@FromDate < u.HireDate, u.HireDate, @FromDate) 
				and IIF(@ToDate > u.ExpirationDate, u.ExpirationDate, @ToDate)
		group by
				v.[UserId], 
				v.UserTypologyGroupId,
				v.[Date]
	) v
	group by 
			v.UserId,
			v.UserTypologyGroupId,
			v.WorkDays
) v
group by
		v.UserTypologyGroupId,
		v.WorkDays,
		v.Workers
), UsersWithUserType as
(
	select u.Oid from dbo.[User] u WHERE (@UserType = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR u.UserType = @UserType)
)
select 
		distinct
		utg.[Name] as TypologyGroup,
		di.[Name] as Division,
		de.[Name] as Department,
		t.TypologyGroupOid,
		IsNull(hd.HeadCount, 0.0) as HeadCount,
		t.Capacity,
		t.Holidays,
		t.Leaves,
		t.ContractedTime,
		t.PlannedTime,
		t.ForecastTime,
		t.ActualTime,
		t.BillableTime,
		t.NewBusinessTime,
		t.AdministrativeTime,
		t.ClientTime,
		t.ClientBillableTime,
		(t.BillableTime + t.PlannedTime) as BillableAndPlannedTime,
		(t.BillableTime + t.ForecastTime) as BillableAndForecastTime,
		IIF(t.Capacity > 0, (t.ClientTime / t.Capacity), 0) AS CapacityClientTimeVariation,
        IIF(t.Capacity > 0, (t.ContractedTime / t.Capacity), 0) AS CapacityContractedTimeVariation,
		IIF(t.Capacity > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.PlannedTime) / t.Capacity), 0) CapacityBillableAndPlannedVariation,
		IIF(t.Capacity > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.ForecastTime) / t.Capacity), 0) CapacityBillableAndForecastVariation,
		IIF(t.ContractedTime > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.PlannedTime) / t.ContractedTime), 0) ContractedBillableAndPlannedVariation,
        IIF(t.ContractedTime > 0, ((t.BillableTime + t.ForecastTime) / t.ContractedTime), 0) ContractedBillableAndForecastVariation
		
from(
select 
		t.TypologyGroupOid,
		sum(t.Capacity) as Capacity,
		sum(t.Holidays) as Holidays,
		sum(t.Leaves) as Leaves,
		sum(t.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
		sum(t.PlannedTime) as PlannedTime,
		sum(t.ForecastTime) as ForecastTime,
		sum(t.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		sum(t.BillableTime) as BillableTime,
		sum(t.NewBusinessTime) as NewBusinessTime,
		sum(t.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
		sum(t.ClientTime) as ClientTime,
		sum(t.ClientBillableTime) as ClientBillableTime
from(
select 
		v.UserTypologyGroupId as TypologyGroupOid,
		sum(v.Capacity) as Capacity,
		sum(v.Holidays) as Holidays,
		sum(v.Leaves) as Leaves,
		sum(v.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
		sum(v.PlannedTime) as PlannedTime,
		sum(v.ForecastTime) as ForecastTime,
		sum(v.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		sum(v.BillableTime) as BillableTime,
		sum(v.NewBusinessTime) as NewBusinessTime,
		sum(v.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
		sum(v.BillableTime + v.NewBusinessTime) as ClientTime,
		sum(v.ClientBillableTime) as ClientBillableTime
from 
(
select 
		du.UserTypologyGroupId,
		sum(du.Capacity) as Capacity,
		sum(du.HolidayTime) as Holidays,
		sum(du.LeaveTime) as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		sum(du.ActualTime) as ActualTime,
		sum(du.BillableTime) as BillableTime,
		sum(du.NewBusinessTime) as NewBusinessTime,
		sum(du.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.DatamartUser du,
		UsersWithUserType uut
where 
        (du.EndDate is null or du.EndDate > @ToDate) AND
		du.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
        DATEPART(DW, du.[Date]) not in (1,7) and
		(du.CompanyId = @CompanyOid OR @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') AND
		uut.Oid = du.Oid
group by 
		du.UserTypologyGroupId
union all
select 
		v.UserTypologyGroupId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		sum((v.ContractedTime / v.EstimateWorkDays) * v.WorkDays) as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from (
	select
			SUM(
				(DATEDIFF(dd, IIF(de.[Date] < @FromDate, @FromDate, de.[Date]), IIF(de.Expiration > @ToDate, @ToDate, de.Expiration)) + 1)
				-(DATEDIFF(wk, IIF(de.[Date] < @FromDate, @FromDate, de.[Date]), IIF(de.Expiration > @ToDate, @ToDate, de.Expiration)) * 2)
				-(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, IIF(de.[Date] < @FromDate, @FromDate, de.[Date])) = 'Sunday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
				-(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, IIF(de.Expiration > @ToDate, @ToDate, de.Expiration)) = 'Saturday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
			)
			as WorkDays,
			SUM(
				(DATEDIFF(dd, de.[Date], de.Expiration) + 1)
				-(DATEDIFF(wk, de.[Date], de.Expiration) * 2)
				-(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, de.[Date]) = 'Sunday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
				-(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, de.Expiration) = 'Saturday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
			)
			as EstimateWorkDays,
			de.UserTypologyGroupId,
			de.UserId,
			sum(de.[Hours]) as ContractedTime
	from 
			Analytics.DatamartEstimate de
	where 
			(de.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate or de.Expiration between @FromDate AND @ToDate) and
			(de.CompanyId = @CompanyOid OR @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
	group by 
			de.UserTypologyGroupId,
			de.UserId
) v
group by v.UserTypologyGroupId
union all
select 
		pht.UserTypologyGroupId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		sum(pht.[Hours])as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.DatamartPlannedHoursTotal pht 
		left outer join Analytics.DatamartProject dp on pht.ProjectId = dp.Oid,
		UsersWithUserType uut
where 
		dp.[ProjectEndDate] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
		(pht.CompanyId = @CompanyOid OR @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') AND
		uut.Oid = pht.UserId
group by 
		pht.UserTypologyGroupId
union all
select 
		ph.UserTypologyGroupId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		sum(ph.[Hours]) as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		0 as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.DatamartPlannedHours ph,
		Analytics.DatamartProject dp,
		UsersWithUserType uut
where 
		ph.ProjectId = dp.Oid and
		dp.[Date] between @FromDate AND DATEADD(dd, -1, @ToDate) and
		(ph.CompanyId = @CompanyOid OR @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') AND
		uut.Oid = ph.UserId
group by 
		ph.UserTypologyGroupId
union all
select 
		dt.UserTypologyGroupId,
		0 as Capacity,
		0 as Holidays,
		0 as Leaves,
		0 as ContractedTime,
		0 as PlannedTime,
		0 as ForecastTime,
		0 as ActualTime,
		0 as BillableTime,
		0 as NewBusinessTime,
		0 as AdministrativeTime,
		0 as ClientTime,
		sum(dt.ActualTime) as ClientBillableTime
from 
		Analytics.DatamartTimesheet dt,
		UsersWithUserType uut
where 
		dt.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate and
		dt.Client is not null and
		(dt.CompanyId = @CompanyOid OR @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') AND
		uut.Oid = dt.UserId
group by 
		dt.UserTypologyGroupId
) v		
group by
		v.UserTypologyGroupId 
) t
where t.TypologyGroupOid is not null
group by 
		t.TypologyGroupOid
) t 
    left outer join HeadCount hd on hd.UserTypologyGroupId = t.TypologyGroupOid
    left outer join dbo.UserTypologyGroup utg on utg.Oid = t.TypologyGroupOid
    left outer join dbo.UserTypology ut on ut.UserTypologyGroup = t.TypologyGroupOid
	left outer join dbo.Department de on de.Oid = ut.Department
	left outer join dbo.Division di on di.Oid = de.Division
where 
	(di.Oid = @DivisionOid OR @DivisionOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') AND 
	(de.Oid = @DepartmentOid OR @DepartmentOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') AND
	utg.[Name] IS NOT NULL
order by 
	utg.[Name]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","CompanyOid","DivisionOid","DepartmentOid","UserType"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Utilization per User
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Billable and Non-Billable Actual Hours in % of User Capacity","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetFrameStyle":{},"WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":30,"WidgetRows":15,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":false,"metricName":"# Forecast","metricFieldValue":"TimeGrandTotal"},{"visible":false,"metricName":"# Actual","metricFieldValue":"UtilizationPercentGrandTotal"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT
		v.UserType,
		v.FullName,
		v.UserId,
		--v.HasImage as HasImage,
		v.[Hours],
		v.AdministrativeHours,
		v.InternalWorkHours,
        v.NewBusinessHours,
        v.BillableHours,
		v.ClientHours,
		v.NonWorkedHours,
		v.Capacity,
		v.Leaves,
		v.ContractedTime,
		v.ForecastTime,
        (v.BillableHours + v.ForecastTime) as BillableAndForecastTime,
        IIF(v.Capacity > 0, (v.ContractedTime / v.Capacity), 0) AS CapacityContractedTimeVariation,
        IIF(v.Capacity > 0, ((v.BillableHours + v.ForecastTime) / v.Capacity), 0) CapacityBillableAndForecastVariation,
        IIF(v.ContractedTime > 0, ((v.BillableHours + v.ForecastTime) / v.ContractedTime), 0) ContractedBillableAndForecastVariation,
		IIF(v.Capacity > 0, ISNULL(v.BillableHours, 0.0) / v.Capacity, 1.0) as UtilizationPercentage,
		IIF(v.Capacity > 0, ISNULL(v.NewBusinessHours, 0.0) / v.Capacity, 1.0) as UtilizationNonBillablePercentage
from 
(
	select 
			du.UserType,
			du.FullName,
			v.UserId,
			--du.HasImage as HasImage,
			sum(v.[Hours]) as [Hours],
			sum(v.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeHours,
			sum(v.InternalWorkHours) as InternalWorkHours,
            sum(v.NewBusinessHours) as NewBusinessHours,
		    sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
			--sum(v.NewBusinessHours) as NewBusinessHours,
			--sum(v.BillableHours) as BillableHours,
			sum(v.ClientHours) as ClientHours,
			sum(v.NonWorkedHours) as NonWorkedHours,
			sum(v.Capacity) as Capacity,
			sum(v.LeaveTime) as Leaves,
			sum(v.ContractedTime) as ContractedTime,
			sum(v.ForecastTime) as ForecastTime
	from (
		select 
				du.Oid as UserId,
				sum(du.ActualTime) as [Hours],
				sum(du.AdministrativeTime) as AdministrativeTime,
				0 as InternalWorkHours,
				sum(du.NewBusinessTime) as NewBusinessHours,
				sum(du.BillableTime) as BillableHours,
				0 as ClientHours,
				SUM(ISNULL(du.ActualTime - (du.AdministrativeTime + du.NewBusinessTime + du.BillableTime), 0.0)) as NonWorkedHours,
				sum(du.Capacity) as Capacity,
				sum(du.LeaveTime) as LeaveTime,
				0 as ContractedTime,
				0 as ForecastTime
		from 
				Analytics.[User](@CurrentUserId) du
		where 
				(du.EndDate is null or du.EndDate > @ToDate) and
				du.[Date] between @FromDate AND DATEADD(dd, -1, @ToDate) and
                DATEPART(DW, du.[Date]) in (2,3,4,5,6) and
				(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR du.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
				(du.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
		group by 
					du.Oid
		union
		select 
				dt.UserId,
				0 as [Hours],
				0 as AdministrativeTime,
				SUM(ISNULL(dt.InternalWorkTime, 0.0)) AS [InternalWorkHours],
				0 as NewBusinessHours,
				0 as BillableHours,
				SUM(ISNULL(dt.BillableTime, 0.0) - ISNULL(dt.[InternalWorkTime], 0.0)) as [ClientHours],
				0 as NonWorkedHours,
				0 as Capacity,
				0 as LeaveTime,
				0 as ContractedTime,
				0 as ForecastTime
		from 
				Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) dt
		where 
				dt.[Date] between @FromDate AND DATEADD(dd, -1, @ToDate) and
				(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR dt.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
				(dt.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
		group by 
				dt.UserId
		union
		select 
                v.UserId,
                0 as [Hours],
				0 as AdministrativeTime,
				0 AS [InternalWorkHours],
				0 as NewBusinessHours,
				0 as BillableHours,
				0 as [ClientHours],
				0 as NonWorkedHours,
				0 as Capacity,
				0 as LeaveTime,
                sum((v.ContractedTime / v.EstimateWorkDays) * v.WorkDays) as ContractedTime,
                0 as ForecastTime
        from (
            select
                    SUM(
                        (DATEDIFF(dd, IIF(de.[Date] < @FromDate, @FromDate, de.[Date]), IIF(de.Expiration > @ToDate, @ToDate, de.Expiration)) + 1)
                        -(DATEDIFF(wk, IIF(de.[Date] < @FromDate, @FromDate, de.[Date]), IIF(de.Expiration > @ToDate, @ToDate, de.Expiration)) * 2)
                        -(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, IIF(de.[Date] < @FromDate, @FromDate, de.[Date])) = 'Sunday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
                        -(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, IIF(de.Expiration > @ToDate, @ToDate, de.Expiration)) = 'Saturday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
                    )
                    as WorkDays,
                    SUM(
                        (DATEDIFF(dd, de.[Date], de.Expiration) + 1)
                        -(DATEDIFF(wk, de.[Date], de.Expiration) * 2)
                        -(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, de.[Date]) = 'Sunday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
                        -(CASE WHEN DATENAME(dw, de.Expiration) = 'Saturday' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
                    )
                    as EstimateWorkDays,
                    de.UserTypologyGroupId,
                    de.UserId,
                    sum(de.[Hours]) as ContractedTime
            from 
                    Analytics.DatamartEstimate de
            where 
                    (de.[Date] between @FromDate AND @ToDate or de.Expiration between @FromDate AND @ToDate) and
                    (de.CompanyId = @CompanyOid OR @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
                    (de.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
            group by 
                    de.UserTypologyGroupId,
                    de.UserId
        ) v
        group by v.UserId
		union
		select 
				ph.UserId as UserId,
				0 as [Hours],
				0 as AdministrativeTime,
				0 AS [InternalWorkHours],
				0 as NewBusinessHours,
				0 as BillableHours,
				0 as [ClientHours],
				0 as NonWorkedHours,
				0 as Capacity,
				0 as LeaveTime,
				0 as ContractedTime,
				sum(ph.[Hours]) as ForecastTime
		from 
				Analytics.DatamartPlannedHours ph,
				Analytics.DatamartProject dp
		where 
				ph.ProjectId = dp.Oid and
                ph.UserId is not null and
				dp.[Date] between @FromDate AND DATEADD(dd, -1, @ToDate) and
				(@CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' OR ph.CompanyId = @CompanyOid) AND 
				(ph.UserTypologyGroupId = @TypologyGroupOid)
		group by 
				ph.UserId
	) v 
left outer join (select distinct du.FullName, /*du.HasImage,*/ du.IsActive, du.UserType, du.UserTypeId, du.Oid from Analytics.[User](@CurrentUserId) du)du on du.Oid = v.UserId
where (du.UserTypeId = @UserType or @UserType = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') 
group by 
		du.UserType,
		du.FullName,
		--du.HasImage,
		v.UserId
) v"}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","companyOid","divisionOid","departmentOid","TypologyGroupOid","UserType"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Filters
